name: Hex (itch) (NoamZeise)
description:
Made in 48 hours

source code
-------------------------

A centered falling block game with hexagons.

Stuck In a gloomy mushroom forest, you are subjected to an endless struggle against the Hex.

Controls

-----------------------

Plus / Minus   -> increase/decrease resolution

Arrow Keys / WASD -> directions

Z / , -> descend one block Esc -> Quit

Rules

------------

Hexagons spawn in 6's if no blocks fell during the previous drop.

They move outward towards the edge of the board every drop cycle

One can select a ring of hexagons and spin them around

Match 5 Hexagons of the same colour to remove them from the board.

If the newly spawning hexagons spawn on top of other hexagons, then it's game over.

note: Hotfix just fixes highscore display and removes mixer dependancy (also built with gnu windows libs)
